humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are no metastatic carcinomas in the axillary lymph nodes (Axillary lymph nodes: Lymphonodulitis reactiva No VII) and the overall diagnosis is Invasive ductal carcinoma of the right breast (NHG3, pT2, pNO). This information aligns with New Rule 10 and New Rule 11, which state that N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes, or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that axillary lymph nodes were removed and examined, but no cancer metastasis was found in them (pNO). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
